pages.text: You can encounter these new attributes that can be found within your journey as a reaper:

pages.title: Essence Alteration
pages.text: The amount of essence alteration you have will affect the chance for reaped essence to upgrade to the next tier (at a maximum of 100%).$(br2)Blood essence can only be upgraded upwards to intoxicated (worth 5 essence) while soul essence can only be upgraded upwards to culled (worth 5 essence).

pages.title: Lifesteal
pages.text: Lifesteal allows you to always heal from dealing damage, the higher your lifesteal, the higher you will heal.$(br2)Having a lifesteal of 15% for example will always heal you by 15% of the damage dealt to your opponent. Successful lifesteal can be indicated by the blood red particles shown and the sound played.
